name: Bubble Pixie Quest
description:
Travel to the pixie forest to save the wild birds trapped in bubble cages.

120 levels of bubble popping fun and addictive fun!

Meet pixie forest friends along your travels.

Take on this completely free great saga quest to a faraway land.

- Puzzle mode: use the limited bubbles to solve the bubble puzzle
- Endless mode: play on and on to clear the dropping bubbles.
- Beautiful 3D animation effects
- Stunning Forest scene.
